meanings.sent1: Her polyphagia led to weight gain.
meanings.sent2: Polyphagia can be a symptom of certain medical conditions.
meanings.sent3: At the buffet, his polyphagia was on full display.
meanings.sent4: Her polyphagia was like a bottomless pit, never satisfied.
meanings.sent5: The image of her polyphagia at the dinner table was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The condition of having an insatiable appetite.
meanings.sent1: His polyphagia made him constantly crave snacks.
meanings.sent2: Polyphagia can be a challenge to manage.
meanings.sent3: Even after a big meal, his polyphagia persisted.
meanings.sent4: Her polyphagia was like a never-ending hunger.
meanings.sent5: The intensity of his polyphagia was hard to ignore.
